parameter.name: database
parameter.description: URL of the backing database (mongodb:// or filedb://).

parameter.name: queueSize
parameter.description: Queue (eg., MongoDB capped collection) size in MB.

parameter.name: postSize
parameter.description: Maximum size of POST data in KB.

parameter.name: sessionsPerIP
parameter.description: Maximum number of connections (sessions) per IP. 0 = unlimited.

parameter.name: useXFF
parameter.description: Get client IP from X-Forwarded-For header if available.
